   38: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   39:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   40:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   41: 	 get_columns_and_rows/1, exit_initial/1, job_control_local/1,
   42: 	 job_control_remote/1,stop_during_init/1,wrap/1,
   43:          shell_history/1, shell_history_resize/1, shell_history_eaccess/1,
   44:          shell_history_repair/1, shell_history_repair_corrupt/1,
   45:          shell_history_corrupt/1,
   46:          shell_history_custom/1, shell_history_custom_errors/1,
   47: 	 job_control_remote_noshell/1,ctrl_keys/1,
   48:          get_columns_and_rows_escript/1,
   49:          shell_navigation/1, shell_multiline_navigation/1, shell_multiline_prompt/1,
   50:          shell_xnfix/1, shell_delete/1,
   51:          shell_transpose/1, shell_search/1, shell_insert/1,

   62:          remsh_basic/1, remsh_error/1, remsh_longnames/1, remsh_no_epmd/1,

   67: -export([test_invalid_keymap/1, test_valid_keymap/1]).
   68: %% Exports for custom shell history module
   69: -export([load/0, add/1]).
   70: %% For custom prompt testing
   71: -export([prompt/1]).
   72: -record(tmux, {peer, node, name, orig_location }).
   73: suite() ->
   74:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   75:      {timetrap,{minutes,3}}].
   76: 
   77: all() ->
   78:     [{group, to_erl},
   79:      {group, tty}].
   80: 
   81: groups() ->
   82:     [{to_erl,[],
   83:       [get_columns_and_rows_escript,get_columns_and_rows,
   84:        exit_initial, job_control_local,
   85:        job_control_remote, job_control_remote_noshell,
   86:        ctrl_keys, stop_during_init, wrap,
   87:        shell_invalid_ansi,
   88:        {group, shell_history},
   89:        {group, remsh}]},
   90:      {shell_history, [],
   91:       [shell_history,
   92:        shell_history_resize,
   93:        shell_history_eaccess,
   94:        shell_history_repair,
   95:        shell_history_repair_corrupt,
   96:        shell_history_corrupt,
   97:        {group, sh_custom}
   98:       ]},
   99:      {sh_custom, [],
  100:       [shell_history_custom,
  101:        shell_history_custom_errors]},
  102:      {remsh, [],
  103:       [remsh_basic,
  104:        remsh_error,
  105:        remsh_longnames,
  106:        remsh_no_epmd,
  107:        remsh_expand_compatibility_25,
  108:        remsh_expand_compatibility_later_version]},
  109:      {tty,[],
  110:       [{group,tty_unicode},
  111:        {group,tty_latin1},
  112:        test_invalid_keymap, test_valid_keymap,
  113:        shell_suspend,
  114:        shell_full_queue,
  115:        external_editor,
  116:        external_editor_visual,
  117:        shell_ignore_pager_commands
  118:       ]},
  119:      {tty_unicode,[parallel],
  120:       [{group,tty_tests},
  121:        shell_invalid_unicode,
  122:        external_editor_unicode
  123:        %% unicode wrapping does not work right yet
  124:        %% shell_unicode_wrap,

  126:        %% shell_delete_unicode_not_at_cursor_wrap,
  127:        %% shell_update_window_unicode_wrap
  128:       ]},
  129:      {tty_latin1,[],[{group,tty_tests}]},
  130:      {tty_tests, [parallel],
  131:       [shell_navigation, shell_multiline_navigation, shell_multiline_prompt,
  132:        shell_xnfix, shell_delete,
  133:        shell_transpose, shell_search, shell_insert,

  141:     ].
  142: 
  143: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  144:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
  145:     os:putenv("TERM", "vt100"),
  146:     [{term,Term}|Config].
  147: 
  148: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  149:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
  150:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
  151:     ok.
  152: 
  153: init_per_group(to_erl, Config) ->
  154:     case rtnode:get_progs() of
  155:         {error, Error} ->
  156:             {skip, Error};
  157:         _ ->
  158:             DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
  159:             [{default_shell,DefShell}|Config]
  160:     end;
  161: init_per_group(remsh, Config) ->
  162:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  163:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  164:         new -> Config
  165:     end;
  166: init_per_group(shell_history, Config) ->
  167:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  168:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  169:         new -> Config
  170:     end;
  171: init_per_group(tty, Config) ->
  172:     case string:split(tmux("-V")," ") of
  173:         ["tmux",[Num,$.|_]] when Num >= $3, Num =< $9 ->
  174:             tmux("kill-session"),
  175:             "" = tmux("-u new-session -x 50 -y 60 -d"),
  176:             ["" = tmux(["set-environment '",Name,"' '",Value,"'"])
  177:              || {Name,Value} <- os:env()],
  178:             Config;
  179:         ["tmux", Vsn] ->
  180:             {skip, "invalid tmux version " ++ Vsn ++ ". Need vsn 3 or later"};
  181:         Error ->
  182:             {skip, "tmux not installed " ++ Error}
  183:     end;
  184: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group =:= tty_unicode;
  185:                                    Group =:= tty_latin1 ->
  186:     [Lang,_] =
  187:         string:split(
  188:           os:getenv("LC_ALL",
  189:                     os:getenv("LC_CTYPE",
  190:                               os:getenv("LANG","en_US.UTF-8"))),"."),
  191:     case Group of
  192:         tty_unicode ->
  193:             [{encoding, unicode},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".UTF-8"}]}|Config];
  194:         tty_latin1 ->
  195:             % [{encoding, latin1},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".ISO-8859-1"}]}|Config],
  196:             {skip, "latin1 tests not implemented yet"}
  197:     end;
  198: init_per_group(sh_custom, Config) ->
  199:     %% Ensure that ERL_AFLAGS will not override the value of the shell_history variable.
  200:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-noshell","-kernel","shell_history","not_overridden"]),
  201:     try erpc:call(Node, application, get_env, [kernel, shell_history], rtnode:timeout(normal)) of
  202:         {ok, not_overridden} ->
  203:             Config;
  204:         _ ->
  205:             SkipText = "shell_history variable is overridden (probably by ERL_AFLAGS)",
  206:             {skip, SkipText}
  207:     catch
  208:         C:R:Stk ->
  209:             io:format("~p\n~p\n~p\n", [C,R,Stk]),
  210:             {skip, "Unexpected error"}
  211:     after
  212:         peer:stop(Peer)
  213:     end;
  214: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  215:     Config.
  216: 
  217: end_per_group(tty, _Config) ->
  218:     Windows = string:split(tmux("list-windows"), "\n", all),
  219:     lists:foreach(
  220:       fun(W) ->
  221:               case string:split(W, " ", all) of
  222:                   ["0:" | _] -> ok;
  223:                   [No, _Name | _] ->
  224:                       "" = os:cmd(["tmux select-window -t ", string:split(No,":")]),
  225:                       ct:log("~ts~n~ts",[W, os:cmd(lists:concat(["tmux capture-pane -p -e"]))])
  226:               end
  227:       end, Windows),
  228: %    "" = os:cmd("tmux kill-session")
  229:     ok;
  230: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  231:     Config.
  232: 
  233: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) ->
  234:     Path = [Func,
  235:             [proplists:get_value(name,P) ||
  236:                 P <- [proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[])] ++
  237:                     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])]],
  238:     [{tc_path, lists:concat(lists:join("-",lists:flatten(Path)))} | Config].
  239: 
  240: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  241:     GroupProperties = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  242:     case (GroupProperties =/= false) andalso proplists:get_value(parallel, GroupProperties, false) of
  243:         true -> ok;
  244:         false ->
  245:             %% Terminate any connected nodes. They may disturb test cases that follow.
  246:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  247:                                   catch erpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, [])
  248:                           end, nodes()),
  249:             ok
  250:     end.
  251: 
  252: %%-define(DEBUG,1).
  253: -ifdef(DEBUG).
  254: -define(dbg(Data),ct:pal("~p",[Data])).
  255: -else.
  256: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
  257: -endif.
  258: 
  259: string_to_term(Str) ->
  260:     {ok,Tokens,_EndLine} = erl_scan:string(Str ++ "."),
  261:     {ok,AbsForm} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
  262:     {value,Value,_Bs} = erl_eval:exprs(AbsForm, erl_eval:new_bindings()),
  263:     Value.
  264: 
  265: run_unbuffer_escript(Rows, Columns, EScript, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut) ->
  266:     DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  267:     TmpFile = filename:join(DataDir, "tmp"),
  268:     ok = file:write_file(TmpFile, <<>>),
  269:     CommandModifier =
  270:         case {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} of
  271:             {false, false} -> "";
  272:             {true, false} -> io_lib:format(" < ~s", [TmpFile]);
  273:             {false, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile]);
  274:             {true, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s < ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile, TmpFile])
  275:         end,
  276:     Command = io_lib:format("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty rows ~p; stty columns ~p; escript ~s ~s\"",
  277:                             [Rows, Columns, EScript, CommandModifier]),
  278:     %% io:format("Command: ~s ~n", [Command]),
  279:     Out = os:cmd(Command),
  280:     %% io:format("Out: ~p ~n", [Out]),
  281:     string_to_term(Out).
  282: 
  283: get_columns_and_rows_escript(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  284:     ExpectUnbufferInstalled =
  285:         try
  286:             "79" = string:trim(os:cmd("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty columns 79 ; tput cols\"")),
  287:             true
  288:         catch
  289:             _:_ -> false
  290:         end,
  291:     case ExpectUnbufferInstalled of
  292:         false ->
  293:             {skip,
  294:              "The unbuffer tool (https://core.tcl-lang.org/expect/index) does not seem to be installed.~n"
  295:              "On Ubuntu/Debian: \"sudo apt-get install expect\""};
  296:         true ->
  297:             DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  298:             IoColumnsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_columns.erl"),
  299:             IoRowsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_rows.erl"),
  300:             [
  301:              begin
  302:                  {ok, 42} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut),
  303:                  {ok, 99} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut)
  304:              end
  305:              ||
  306:                 {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} <- [{false, false}, {true, false}, {false, true}]
  307:             ],
  308:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, true, true),
  309:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, true, true),
  310:             ok
  311:     end.
  312: 
  313: %% Test that the shell can access columns and rows.
  314: get_columns_and_rows(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  315:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  316: 	old ->
  317:             test_columns_and_rows(old, []);
  318: 	new ->
  319:             test_columns_and_rows(old, ["-oldshell"]),
  320:             test_columns_and_rows(new, [])
  321:     end,
  322:     ok.
  323: 
  324: test_columns_and_rows(old, Args) ->
  325:     rtnode:run(
  326:       [{putline, ""},
  327:        {putline, "2."},
  328:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  329:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  330:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"},
  331:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  332:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"}
  333:       ], [], [], Args),
  334: 
  335:     rtnode:run(
  336:       [{putline, ""},
  337:        {putline, "2."},
  338:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  339:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  340:        {expect, "{ok,90}\r\n"},
  341:        {putline,"io:rows()."},
  342:        {expect, "{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  343:       [],
  344:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ",
  345:       Args);
  346: test_columns_and_rows(new, _Args) ->
  347:     rtnode:run(
  348:       [{putline, ""},
  349:        {expect, "1> $"},
  350:        {putline, "2."},
  351:        {expect, "\r\n2\r\n"},
  352:        {expect, "> $"},
  353:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  354:        {expect, "{ok,80}\r\n"},
  355:        {expect, "> $"},
  356:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  357:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,24}\r\n"}
  358:       ]),
  359: 
  360:     rtnode:run(
  361:       [{putline, ""},
  362:        {expect, "1> $"},
  363:        {putline, "2."},
  364:        {expect,  "\r\n2\r\n"},
  365:        {expect, "> $"},
  366:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  367:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,90}\r\n"},
  368:        {expect, "> $"},
  369:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  370:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  371:       [],
  372:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ").
  373: 
  374: shell_navigation(Config) ->
  375: 
  376:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  377: 
  378:     try
  379:         [begin
  380:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}"),
  381:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward
  382:              check_content(Term, "{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}$"),
  383:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  384:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  385:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  386:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  387:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  388:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  389:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  390:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  391:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  392:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',")}),
  393:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  394:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  395:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  396:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b'")}),
  397:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  398:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  399:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  400:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
  401:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  402:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  403:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  404:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  405:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  406:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  407:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  408:          end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  409:         ok
  410:     after
  411:         stop_tty(Term)
  412:     end.
  413: shell_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
  414:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  415: 
  416:     try
  417:         [begin
  418:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  419:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,"),
  420:              check_location(Term, {0,width("{aaa,")}),
  421:              send_tty(Term,"\n'b"++U++"b',"),
  422:              check_location(Term, {0, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  423:              send_tty(Term,"\nccc}"),
  424:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward (blink)
  425:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  426:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  427:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  428:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  429:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  430:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  431:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  432:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc")}),
  433:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  434:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  435:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  436:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  437:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  438:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  439:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  440:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  441:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  442:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 1}),
  443:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  444:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b'")}),
  445:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  446:              check_location(Term, {-2, width("{aaa,")}),
  447:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  448:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  449:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  450:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  451:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  452:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U)}),
  453:              send_tty(Term,"M-<"),
  454:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  455:              send_tty(Term,"M->"),
  456:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  457:              check_location(Term, {0,width("ccc")}),
  458:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  459:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  460:              check_location(Term, {0,0}),
  461:              send_tty(Term,"C-h"), % Backspace
  462:              check_location(Term, {-1,width("ccc}")}),
  463:              send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  464:              send_tty(Term, "End"),
  465:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  466:              send_tty(Term,"M-Enter"),
  467:              check_content(Term, ".. ,"),
  468:              check_location(Term, {-1,0}),
  469:              send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  470:              check_location(Term, {-3,0}),
  471:              send_tty(Term,"{'"++U++"',\n\n\nworks}.\n")
  472:             end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  473:         ok
  474:     after
  475:         stop_tty(Term)
  476:     end.
  477: 
  478: shell_multiline_prompt(Config) ->
  479:     Term1 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","{edlin,inverted_space_prompt}"]}|Config]),
  480:     Term2 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","\"...> \""]}|Config]),
  481:     Term3 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","edlin"]}|Config]),
  482: 
  483:     try
  484:         check_location(Term1, {0, 0}),
  485:         send_tty(Term1,"\na"),
  486:         check_location(Term1, {0, 1}),
  487:         check_content(Term1, "   a"),
  488:         ok
  489:     after
  490:         stop_tty(Term1)
  491:     end,
  492:     try
  493:         check_location(Term2, {0, 0}),
  494:         send_tty(Term2,"\na"),
  495:         check_location(Term2, {0, 1}),
  496:         check_content(Term2, "...> a"),
  497:         ok
  498:     after
  499:         stop_tty(Term2)
  500:     end,
  501:     try
  502:         send_tty(Term3,"\na"),
  503:         check_location(Term3, {0, 1}),
  504:         check_content(Term3, ".. a"),
  505:         ok
  506:     after
  507:         stop_tty(Term3)
  508:     end.
  509: 
  510: shell_clear(Config) ->
  511: 
  512:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  513:     {Rows, _Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  514: 
  515:     try
  516:         send_tty(Term,"foobar."),
  517:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  518:         check_content(Term, "foobar"),
  519:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  520:         send_tty(Term,"bazbat"),
  521:         check_location(Term, {0, 6}),
  522:         send_tty(Term,"C-L"),
  523:         check_location(Term, {-Rows+1, 6}),
  524:         check_content(Term, "bazbat")
  525:     after
  526:         stop_tty(Term)
  527:     end.
  528: 
  529: shell_xnfix(Config) ->
  530: 
  531:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  532: 
  533:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  534:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  535: 
  536:     As = lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1,"a"),
  537: 
  538:     try
  539:         [begin
  540:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  541:              send_tty(Term,As),
  542:              check_content(Term,[As,$$]),
  543:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - 1}),
  544:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  545:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  546:              send_tty(Term,"aaa"),
  547:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col + 3}),
  548:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,3 + width(U))],
  549:              send_tty(Term,U),
  550:              %% a{Cols-1}U\naaaaa
  551:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  552:                                  U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  553:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  554:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  555:              send_tty(Term,U),
  556:              %% a{Cols-1}U\nUaaaaa
  557:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  558:                                  U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  559:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  560:              %% send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  561:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  562:              %% a{Cols-2}U\nUaaaaa
  563:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  564:              %%                     U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  565:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  566:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  567:              %%                     U,U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  568:              %% send_tty(Term,"aa"),
  569:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  570:              %%                     U,"a\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  571:              %% check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  572:              send_tty(Term,"C-K"),
  573:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  574:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  575:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  576:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  577:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  578:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  579:              ok
  580:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  581:     after
  582:         stop_tty(Term)
  583:     end.
  584: 
  585: 
  586: %% Characters that are larger than 2 wide need special handling when they
  587: %% are at the end of the current line.
  588: shell_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  589: 
  590:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  591: 
  592:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  593:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  594: 
  595:     try
  596:         [begin
  597:              FirstLine = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U)*2 + 1,"a")],
  598:              OtherLineA = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"a")],
  599:              OtherLineB = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"b")],
  600:              OtherLineC = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"c")],
  601:              OtherLineD = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"d")],
  602:              send_tty(Term,FirstLine),
  603:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  604:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  605: 
  606:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineA),
  607:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  608:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  609: 
  610:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineB),
  611:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  612:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  613: 
  614:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineC),
  615:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  616:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  617: 
  618:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineD),
  619:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  620:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  621: 
  622:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  623:              check_location(Term, {-4, 0}), %% Broken
  624:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  625:              check_location(Term, {-4, width(U)}), %% Broken
  626: 
  627:              send_tty(Term,"DC"), %% Broken
  628:              check_content(Term, ["a.*",U,"$"]),
  629:              check_content(Term, ["^b.*",U,"c$"]),
  630:              check_content(Term, ["^c.*",U,"dd$"]),
  631: 
  632:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  633:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  634:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  635:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  636:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  637:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  638: 
  639:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  640:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  641:     after
  642:         stop_tty(Term)
  643:     end.
  644: 
  645: shell_delete(Config) ->
  646: 
  647:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  648: 
  649:     try
  650: 
  651:         [ begin
  652:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  653:               check_content(Term, "> a$"),
  654:               check_location(Term, {0, 1}),
  655:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  656:               check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  657:               check_content(Term, ">$"),
  658:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  659:               send_tty(Term,U),
  660:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a, U])}),
  661:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  662:               send_tty(Term,U),
  663:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U,$a,U])}),
  664:               check_content(Term, ["> a",U,$a,U,"$"]),
  665:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  666:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  667:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  668:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  669:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  670:               send_tty(Term,U),
  671:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U])}),
  672:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  673:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  674:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  675:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  676:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  677:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  678:               check_content(Term, ["> a$"]),
  679:               send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  680:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  681:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  682:               check_location(Term, {0, width([])})
  683:           end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  684:     after
  685:         stop_tty(Term)
  686:     end.
  687: 
  688: %% When deleting characters at the edge of the screen that are "large",
  689: %% we need to take special care.
  690: shell_delete_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  691: 
  692:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  693: 
  694:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  695:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  696: 
  697:     try
  698:         [begin
  699:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  700:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  701:              send_tty(Term,[U,U,"aaaaa"]),
  702:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,U,"aaaaa$"]),
  703:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,5+2)],
  704:              check_location(Term,{0,-Col}),
  705:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  706:              check_content(Term,"> a* \n"),
  707:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 1}),
  708:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  709:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  710:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 2}),
  711:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  712:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U," \n"]),
  713:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 3}),
  714:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  715:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"\n"]),
  716:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  717:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 4}),
  718:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  719:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"a\n"]),
  720:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  721:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 5}),
  722:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  723:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  724:     after
  725:         stop_tty(Term)
  726:     end.
  727: 
  728: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  729: %% to take extra care
  730: shell_delete_unicode_not_at_cursor_wrap(Config) ->
  731: 
  732:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  733: 
  734:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  735:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  736: 
  737:     try
  738:         [begin
  739:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  740:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  741:              send_tty(Term,["a",U,"aaaaa"]),
  742:              check_content(Term,["\na",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  743:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  744:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  745:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  746:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  747:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  748:              check_content(Term,["> a* \n"]),
  749:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  750:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  751:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  752:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  753:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  754:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"a\n"]),
  755:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  756:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  757:     after
  758:         stop_tty(Term)
  759:     end.
  760: 
  761: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  762: %% to take extra care
  763: shell_update_window_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  764: 
  765:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  766: 
  767:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  768:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  769: 
  770:     try
  771:         [begin
  772:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U) + 1,"a")),
  773:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  774:              send_tty(Term,[U,"aaaaa"]),
  775:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  776:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols+1]),
  777:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\naaaaa$"]),
  778:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols]),
  779:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  780:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  781:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  782:     after
  783:         stop_tty(Term)
  784:     end.
  785: 
  786: shell_transpose(Config) ->
  787: 
  788:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  789: 
  790:     Unicode = [[$a]] ++ hard_unicode(),
  791: 
  792:     try
  793:         [
  794:          begin
  795:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  796:              [send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U],
  797:              send_tty(Term,"b"),
  798:              [[send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U2] || U2 <- Unicode],
  799:              send_tty(Term,"cde"),
  800:              check_content(Term, ["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  801:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde"])}),
  802:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  803:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  804:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  805:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  806:              check_location(Term, {0, 1+width([U])}),
  807:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  808:              check_content(Term, ["ab",U,Unicode,"cde$"]),
  809:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  810:              check_content(Term, ["ab",hd(Unicode),U,tl(Unicode),"cde$"]),
  811:              [send_tty(Term,"C-T") || _ <- lists:seq(1,length(Unicode)-1)],
  812:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,U,"cde$"]),
  813:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  814:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de$"]),
  815:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U])}),
  816:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  817:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de"])}),
  818:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  819:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  820:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  821:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  822:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  823:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  824:          end || U <- Unicode],
  825:         ok
  826:     after
  827:         stop_tty(Term),
  828:         ok
  829:     end.
  830: 
  831: shell_search(C) ->
  832:     Term = start_tty(C),
  833: 
  834:     try
  835:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  836:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  837:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  838:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  839:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  840:         send_tty(Term,[16#1f600]),
  841:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  842:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  843:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  844:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  845:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  846:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  847:         send_tty(Term,"C-a"),
  848:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(C, "'a'.")}),
  849:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  850:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  851:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  852:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  853:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  854:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  855:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*a."),
  856:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  857:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  858:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  859:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  860:         send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  861:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  862:         ok
  863:     after
  864:         stop_tty(Term),
  865:         ok
  866:     end.
  867: 
  868: shell_insert(Config) ->
  869:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  870: 
  871:     try
  872:         send_tty(Term,"abcdefghijklm"),
  873:         check_content(Term, "abcdefghijklm$"),
  874:         check_location(Term, {0, 13}),
  875:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  876:         send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  877:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  878:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  879:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  880:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  881:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijklm$"),
  882:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
  883:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  884:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  885:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  886:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijlm$"),
  887:         ok
  888:     after
  889:         stop_tty(Term)
  890:     end.
  891: 
  892: shell_update_window(Config) ->
  893:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  894: 
  895:     Text = lists:flatten(["abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm"]),
  896:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  897: 
  898:     try
  899:         send_tty(Term,Text),
  900:         check_content(Term,Text),
  901:         check_location(Term, {0, width(Text)}),
  902:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col+1]),
  903:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  904:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  905:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  906:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col]),
  907:         %% xnfix bug! at least in tmux... seems to work in iTerm as it does not
  908:         %% need xnfix when resizing
  909:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  910:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text) div 2 + Col]),
  911:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col + width(Text) div 2}),
  912:         ok
  913:     after
  914:         stop_tty(Term)
  915:     end.
  916: shell_small_window_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
  917:     Term0 = start_tty(Config),
  918:     tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term0)," -x ",30, " -y ", 6]),
  919:     {Row, Col} = get_location(Term0),
  920:     Term = Term0#tmux{orig_location = {Row, Col}},
  921:     Text = ("xbcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
  922:         "abcdefghijkl\n"++
  923:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
  924:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklx"),
  925:     try
  926:         send_tty(Term,Text),
  927:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
  928:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  929:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  930:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  931:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  932:         send_tty(Term, "C-Down"),
  933:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  934:         send_tty(Term, "Left"),
  935:         check_location(Term, {-1, -4}),
  936:         send_tty(Term, "Right"),
  937:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  938:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4A"),
  939:         check_location(Term, {-5, 0}),
  940:         check_content(Term,"xbc"),
  941:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4B"),
  942:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
  943:         check_content(Term,"klx"),
  944:         send_tty(Term, " sets:is_e\t"),
  945:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
  946:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
  947:         check_location(Term, {-3, 6}),
  948:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  949:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  950:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  951:         send_tty(Term, "sets:is_e\t"),
  952:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
  953:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
  954:         check_location(Term, {-4, 9}),
  955:         send_tty(Term, "M-Enter"),
  956:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  957:         ok
  958:     after
  959:         stop_tty(Term)
  960:     end.
  961: shell_huge_input(Config) ->
  962:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  963: 
  964:     ManyUnicode = lists:duplicate(100,hard_unicode()),
  965: 
  966:     try
  967:         send_tty(Term,ManyUnicode),
  968:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode_match(Config) ++ "$",
  969:                       #{ replace => {"\n",""} }),
  970:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  971:         ok
  972:     after
  973:         stop_tty(Term)
  974:     end.
  975: shell_receive_standard_out(Config) ->
  976:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  977:     try
  978:         send_tty(Term,"my_fun(5) -> ok; my_fun(N) -> receive after 100 -> io:format(\"~p\\n\", [N]), my_fun(N+1) end.\n"),
  979:         send_tty(Term, "spawn(shell_default, my_fun, [0]). ABC\n"),
  980:         timer:sleep(1000),
  981:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that we are at the same location relative to the start.
  982:         check_content(Term, "3\\s+4\\s+.+>\\sABC"),
  983:         ok
  984:     after
  985:         stop_tty(Term)
  986:     end.
  987: %% Test that the shell works when invalid utf-8 (aka latin1) is sent to it
  988: shell_invalid_unicode(Config) ->
  989:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  990: 
  991:     InvalidUnicode = <<$,$,$>>, %%  in latin1
  992: 
  993:     try
  994:         send_tty(Term,hard_unicode()),
  995:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode() ++ "$"),
  996:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  997:         check_content(Term, "illegal character"),
  998:         %% Send invalid utf-8
  999:         send_stdin(Term,InvalidUnicode),
 1000:         %% Check that the utf-8 was echoed
 1001:         check_content(Term, "\\\\345\\\\344\\\\366$"),
 1002:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1003:         %% Check that the terminal entered "latin1" mode
 1004:         send_tty(Term,"."),
 1005:         check_content(Term, "\\Q\\360\\237\\230\\200\\355\\225\\234.\\E$"),
 1006:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1007:         %% Check that we can reset the encoding to unicode
 1008:         send_tty(Term,"io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."),
 1009:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1010:         check_content(Term, "\nok\n"),
 1011:         send_tty(Term,""),
 1012:         check_content(Term, "$"),
 1013:         ok
 1014:     after
 1015:         stop_tty(Term),
 1016:         ok
 1017:     end.
 1018: 
 1019: 
 1020: %% Test the we can handle ansi insert, navigation and delete
 1021: %%   We currently can not so skip this test
 1022: shell_support_ansi_input(Config) ->
 1023: 
 1024:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1025: 
 1026:     BoldText = "\e[;1m",
 1027:     ClearText = "\e[0m",
 1028: 
 1029:     try
 1030:         send_stdin(Term,["{",BoldText,"ab",ClearText,"}"]),
 1031:         timer:sleep(1000),
 1032:         try check_location(Term, {0, width("{1mabm}")}) of
 1033:             _ ->
 1034:                 throw({skip, "Do not support ansi input"})
 1035:         catch _:_ ->
 1036:                 ok
 1037:         end,
 1038:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{ab}")}),
 1039:         check_content(fun() -> get_content(Term,"-e") end,
 1040:                       ["{", BoldText, "ab", ClearText, "}"]),
 1041:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1042:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1043:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{a")}),
 1044:         send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
 1045:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
 1046:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
 1047:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1048:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1049:         check_content(Term, ["{", BoldText, "a"]),
 1050:         ok
 1051:     after
 1052:         stop_tty(Term),
 1053:         ok
 1054:     end.
 1055: 
 1056: shell_expand_location_below(Config) ->
 1057: 
 1058:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1059: 
 1060:     {Rows, _} = get_location(Term),
 1061: 
 1062:     NumFunctions = lists:seq(0, Rows*2),
 1063:     FunctionName = "a_long_function_name",
 1064: 
 1065:     Module = lists:flatten(
 1066:                ["-module(long_module).\n",
 1067:                 "-export([",lists:join($,,[io_lib:format("~s~p/0",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]),"]).\n\n",
 1068:                 [io_lib:format("~s~p() -> ok.\n",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]]),
 1069: 
 1070:     DoScan = fun F([]) ->
 1071:                      [];
 1072:                  F(Str) ->
 1073:                      {done,{ok,T,_},C} = erl_scan:tokens([],Str,0),
 1074:                      [ T | F(C) ]
 1075:              end,
 1076:     Forms = [ begin {ok,Y} = erl_parse:parse_form(X),Y end || X <- DoScan(Module) ],
 1077:     {ok,_,Bin} = compile:forms(Forms, [debug_info]),
 1078: 
 1079:     try
 1080:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1081: 
 1082:         %% First check that basic completion works
 1083:         send_stdin(Term, "escript:"),
 1084:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1085:         %% Cursor at correct place
 1086:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:")}),
 1087:         %% Nothing after the start( completion
 1088:         check_content(Term, "start\\($"),
 1089: 
 1090:         %% Check that completion is cleared when we type
 1091:         send_stdin(Term, "s"),
 1092:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:s")}),
 1093:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1094: 
 1095:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a term
 1096:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1097:         send_tty(Term, "["),
 1098:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1099:         send_tty(Term, ", test_after]"),
 1100:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", test_after]"],
 1101:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1102:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("[escript:s")}),
 1103:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1104:         send_tty(Term, "C-K"),
 1105: 
 1106:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a long term
 1107:         send_tty(Term, ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"),
 1108:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"],
 1109:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1110:         check_location(Term, {-4, width("[escript:s")}),
 1111:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1112:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1113:         send_stdin(Term, ".\n"),
 1114: 
 1115:         %% Check that we behave as we should with very long completions
 1116:         rpc(Term, fun() ->
 1117:                           {module, long_module} = code:load_binary(long_module, "long_module.beam", Bin)
 1118:                   end),
 1119:         check_content(Term, "3>"),
 1120:         send_stdin(Term, "long_module:" ++ FunctionName),
 1121:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1122:         %% Check that correct text is printed below expansion
 1123:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("Press tab to see all ~p expansions",
 1124:                                           [length(NumFunctions)])),
 1125:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1126:         %% The expansion does not fit on screen, verify that
 1127:         %% expand above mode is used
 1128:         check_content(fun() -> get_content(Term, "-S -5") end,
 1129:                       "\nfunctions\n"),
 1130:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "$"),
 1131: 
 1132:         %% We resize the terminal to make everything fit and test that
 1133:         %% expand below mode is used
 1134:         tmux(["resize-window -t ", tty_name(Term), " -y ", integer_to_list(Rows+10)]),
 1135:         timer:sleep(1000), %% Sleep to make sure window has resized
 1136:         send_stdin(Term, "\t\t"),
 1137:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name99\\($"),
 1138:         ok
 1139:     after
 1140:         stop_tty(Term),
 1141:         ok
 1142:     end.
 1143: 
 1144: shell_expand_location_above(Config) ->
 1145: 
 1146:     Term = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_expand_location","above"]}|Config]),
 1147: 
 1148:     try
 1149:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1150:         send_stdin(Term, "escript:"),
 1151:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1152:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:")}),
 1153:         check_content(Term, "start\\(\n"),
 1154:         check_content(Term, "escript:$"),
 1155:         send_stdin(Term, "s"),
 1156:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1157:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:s")}),
 1158:         check_content(Term, "\nscript_name\\([ ]+start\\(\n"),
 1159:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1160:         ok
 1161:     after
 1162:         stop_tty(Term),
 1163:         ok
 1164:     end.

 1166: %% Test the we can handle invalid ansi escape chars.
 1167: %%   tmux cannot handle this... so we test this using to_erl
 1168: shell_invalid_ansi(_Config) ->
 1169: 
 1170:     InvalidAnsiPrompt =
 1171:         case proplists:get_value(encoding, io:getopts(user)) of
 1172:             unicode ->
 1173:                 ["\e]94m",54620,44397,50612,47,51312,49440,47568,"\e]0m"];
 1174:             latin1 ->
 1175:                 ["\e]94minvalid_test\e]0m"]
 1176:         end,
 1177: 
 1178:     rtnode:run(
 1179:       [{eval, fun() -> application:set_env(
 1180:                          stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test,
 1181:                          fun() -> InvalidAnsiPrompt end)
 1182:               end },
 1183:        {putline,"a."},
 1184:        {expect, "a[.]"},
 1185:        {expect, ["\\Q",InvalidAnsiPrompt,"\\E"]}],
 1186:       "", "",
 1187:       ["-pz",filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1188:        "-connect_all","false",
 1189:        "-kernel","logger_level","all",
 1190:        "-kernel","shell_history","disabled",
 1191:        "-kernel","prevent_overlapping_partitions","false",
 1192:        "-eval","shell:prompt_func({interactive_shell_SUITE,prompt})."
 1193:       ]).

 1195: shell_ignore_pager_commands(Config) ->
 1196:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1197:     case code:get_doc(file, #{sources=>[eep48]}) of
 1198:         {error, _} -> {skip, "No documentation available"};
 1199:         _ ->
 1200:             try
 1201:                 send_tty(Term, "h(file).\n"),
 1202:                 check_content(Term,"\\Qmore (y/n)? (y)\\E"),
 1203:                 send_tty(Term, "n\n"),
 1204:                 check_content(Term,"ok"),
 1205:                 send_tty(Term, "C-P"),
 1206:                 check_content(Term,"\\Qh(file).\\E"),
 1207:                 ok
 1208:             after
 1209:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1210:                 ok
 1211:             end
 1212:     end.

 1217:         check_not_in_content(Term, "Invalid key"),
 1218:         check_not_in_content(Term, "Invalid function"),
 1219:         send_tty(Term, "asdf"),
 1220:         send_tty(Term, "C-u"),
 1221:         check_content(Term, ">$"),
 1222:         ok
 1223:     after
 1224:         stop_tty(Term),
 1225:         ok
 1226:     end.
